item.title: SPC - Scattered Diagram
item.description: Scattered diagram indicates correlation between independent variable (typically on the x-axis) and dependent variable (also known as a function of x, typically on the y-axis).

item.title: QA Organization Justification
item.description: Quality Assurance (QA) is literally everywhere in the corporation environment, it ensures quality results for product, process and development.
